column1: Smoque BBQ////  Four friends  got together for wine and BBQ on Friday-The boys picked up the food. It was a Friday after all
column2: and that means some time to mellow
column4: and enjoy laughter with friends. After splitting a few bottles of wine
column5: i was not feeling too hungry yet
column6: I still needed some liquid hydration both with and without alcohol.  BAD CHOICE!! I should have eaten the second it arrived!!  By the time I got done indulging
